response.original_title: La main de Fatma, se garder du mauvais oeil
response.overview: What does history have to tell us today? History magazine. In this episode: The term “Hand of Fatima” has its origins in colonial Algeria. Many Algerian women wore the symbol as jewelry or pendants. But the symbol goes back much further in history: the hand was already used as a sign of defense in the Middle Ages ...
response.title: La main de Fatma, se garder du mauvais oeil

titles.title: Die Hand der Fatima, Schutz vor dem bösen Blick
